description: Gust Turbulence is the son of a company`s president. Although he is pretty well-off, he prefers to be independent and become a Salvager to earn his own bread. At first look he may be a rash person, but he has skill. He would like Aika to go out with him, but she refuses. He seems to end up in the right place to get the bounty.
name: Gust Turbulence
